member.name: MFVideoTransferMatrix
member.summary: Describes the conversion matrices between Y'PbPr (component video) and studio R'G'B'.

member.name: MFVideoTransferMatrix.MFVideoTransferMatrix_Unknown
member.summary: Unknown transfer matrix. Treat as MFVideoTransferMatrix_BT709.

member.name: MFVideoTransferMatrix.MFVideoTransferMatrix_BT601
member.summary: ITU-R BT.601 transfer matrix. Also used for SMPTE 170 and ITU-R BT.470-2 System B,G.

member.name: MFVideoTransferMatrix.MFVideoTransferMatrix_ForceDWORD
member.summary: Reserved. This member forces the enumeration type to compile as a DWORD value.
